mapper.insert: insert into rcm_firstlevel_lawyer(id, serviceTypeKey, lawyerId) values (#{id},#{serviceTypeKey},#{lawyerId})
mapper.select: select id,serviceTypeKey,lawyerId, (select value from sync_business_model where key=f.servicetypekey and dic_type='0' and parent_id is null) as serviceTypeValue, (select name from sys_user where uuid=f.lawyerid) as lawyerName from rcm_firstlevel_lawyer f

select distinct lawyerId, (select name from sys_user where uuid = f.lawyerid) as lawyerName from rcm_firstlevel_lawyer f where f.servicetypekey in
#{serviceType}
mapper.update: update rcm_firstlevel_lawyer set serviceTypeKey=#{serviceTypeKey}, lawyerId=#{lawyerId} where id=#{id}
